about_the_game:
Create your own Fast Food empire and let the good food unite people! Build, renovate, manage restaurants and face business challenges😋🍔🏢



Become the most popular entrepreneur in the area! Catering business is full of challenges, sacrifices and overwork. Still when the clients reserve tables in your diner like crazy, you get enormous satisfaction from your hardships💼👨‍🍳💪 Build your own Fast Food haven and watch it transform into an empire. Develop your business, open new premises, look for inspiration and climb up the career ladder🚀💼



Apart from a basic booth with burgers, you can open other bars, specialising in other types of this unique branch of gastronomy. Open the best pizza place in town and watch it fill with people every evening.🍕🌃 The lovers of easily accessible sweets, good coffee and atmospheric places, can be invited to your newly opened café. ☕🍰 Watch your Fast Food haven grow, in front of your very eyes, and attract more and more regular clients.📈👀

Renovate, furnish, manage it your way and lead your business according to your vision.



💼💡Hire people, watch the product orders, take care of the hygiene and proper service of your customers.🧹📋 Become the manager of a large catering network and face the challenges that await you at this position. Be on good terms with the various institutions that your existence depends on. Spoil the critics. Always be prepared for the ideas of the competition, who will want to see your restaurants go bankrupt. Do everything to reach the top in the rankings and to keep your position🏆💰🔝
detailed_description:
Create your own Fast Food empire and let the good food unite people! Build, renovate, manage restaurants and face business challenges😋🍔🏢



Become the most popular entrepreneur in the area! Catering business is full of challenges, sacrifices and overwork. Still when the clients reserve tables in your diner like crazy, you get enormous satisfaction from your hardships💼👨‍🍳💪 Build your own Fast Food haven and watch it transform into an empire. Develop your business, open new premises, look for inspiration and climb up the career ladder🚀💼



Apart from a basic booth with burgers, you can open other bars, specialising in other types of this unique branch of gastronomy. Open the best pizza place in town and watch it fill with people every evening.🍕🌃 The lovers of easily accessible sweets, good coffee and atmospheric places, can be invited to your newly opened café. ☕🍰 Watch your Fast Food haven grow, in front of your very eyes, and attract more and more regular clients.📈👀

Renovate, furnish, manage it your way and lead your business according to your vision.



💼💡Hire people, watch the product orders, take care of the hygiene and proper service of your customers.🧹📋 Become the manager of a large catering network and face the challenges that await you at this position. Be on good terms with the various institutions that your existence depends on. Spoil the critics. Always be prepared for the ideas of the competition, who will want to see your restaurants go bankrupt. Do everything to reach the top in the rankings and to keep your position🏆💰🔝
name: Fast Food - Restaurant Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Any modern i3 or AMD 5400X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Recent i5 or AMD 5600x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: Catering business is full of challenges, sacrifices and overwork. Still when the clients reserve tables in your diner like crazy, you get enormous satisfaction from your hardships. Build your own Fast Food haven and watch it transform into an empire.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
